parameters.name: DrillId
parameters.description: The ID of the drill. You can call the [DescribeReplicaGroupDrills](~~2584481~~) operation to query disaster recovery drills that were performed on replication pairs in a specific region.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the replication pair-consistent group. You can call the [DescribeDiskReplicaGroups](~~426614~~) operation to query the most recent list of replication pair-consistent groups, including group IDs.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~354276~~) operation to query the most recent list of regions in which async replication is supported.
